channel.title: CA/NV Amphibian Populations Task Force on California-Nevada Amphibian Populations Task Force
channel.description: Recent content in CA/NV Amphibian Populations Task Force on California-Nevada Amphibian Populations Task Force

item.title: 2021 Annual Meeting Cancelled
item.description: It is with deep regret that we have decided to cancel the annual meeting scheduled for January 14-15, 2021 in Sebastopol, CA. It seems highly unlikely that covid-19 circumstances will improve fast enough for us to have time to plan the meeting and for attendees to make commitments. We look forward to meeting in 2021.

item.title: New APTF Website!
item.description: We’ve made some updates. We hope you like our new(t) website. Stay tuned for more changes and updates to this site.

item.title: Annual Meetings
item.description: Upcoming Meeting 2021 Meeting: Cancelled.
